text: The app is good, but the call center experience isn‚Äôt. I prefer your AI Voice Assistant because it solves my problem in just 30‚Äì50 seconds. In a human call, I first have to enter my date of birth, then select options based on my issue, and only after that do I get connected to a representative. The whole process takes around 7‚Äì8 minutes. The speed should be faster. In the end, my problem was solved. Thank you.

text: Groww needs to seriously improve its Option Chain. For option buyers, it‚Äôs still very basic and cluttered.
